metadata.description: The count of Windows virtual machines to create.

resources.comments: Hub virtual network and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('hubNetwork').name]

resources.comments: Spoke virtual network, subnet, and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('spokeNetwork').name]

resources.comments: Virtual network peering hub to spoke one
resources.name: [concat(parameters('hubNetwork').name, '/', variables('peering-name-hub-to-spoke'))]

resources.comments: Virtual network peering spoke one to hub

resources.comments: Network security group, rules for Bastion
resources.name: [parameters('bastionHost').nsgName]

resources.comments: Public IP address for VPN Gateway

resources.comments: Public IP address for Azure Firewall
resources.name: [parameters('azureFirewall').publicIPAddressName]

resources.comments: Network security group + rules for spoke network and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('spokeNetwork').subnetNsgName]

resources.comments: Route / force tunnel from spokes to Azure firewall
resources.name: [parameters('spokeRoutes').tableName]

resources.comments: Route associated with spoke / resources subnet, any address, through Azure firewall

resources.comments: Route / force tunnel from spokes to Azure firewall
resources.name: [parameters('gatewayRoutes').tableName]
